title: LFT Plat V mid>top>ad
body:
Hey everyone, I would like to trial out for any team that seems fit for a plat 5 player to trial for them. I really would love to be apart of a team environment that flexs scrims and plays together regularly.

I am committed and have a good outlook and have a good attitude. 

Just really keen to improve and play with people.

Add me Míya
